children.value: Pop-up modal boxes are often used for message prompts, message confirmation, or to complete specific interactive operations within the current page. Supports both component calling and function calling.
In order to facilitate the use of
, zebra provides a series of auxiliary functions through which global pop-up components can be quickly evoked.
function, the corresponding pop-up box will be rendered directly on the page after being called.
Used to prompt some messages, which only contains a confirmation button by default.
Used to confirm messages, including confirm and cancel buttons by default.
to display a rounded button style popup.
A callback function can be passed in through the
attribute to perform specific operations before the pop-up window is closed.
If you need to embed components or other custom content within Dialog, you can use the Dialog component directly and use the default slots for customization.

props.code:
import { ref } from 'vue';
const show = ref(false);

children.value: Zebra exports the following Dialog-related auxiliary functions:
Display message prompt pop-up window, including confirmation button by default
Display message confirmation pop-up window, including confirm and cancel buttons by default
Close the currently displayed pop-up window
Modify the default configuration, affecting all
Resets the default configuration, affecting all
Pop-up window width, default unit is
Whether to display the confirmation button
Whether to display the cancel button
Whether to disable the confirm button
Whether to disable the cancel button
whether to display the mask layer
Whether to close the pop-up window after clicking the mask layer
to prevent closing, support returning Promise
animation class name, equivalent to the

whether to display the mask layer
Whether to close the pop-up window after clicking the mask layer

animation class name, equivalent to the
through a component, the following events are supported:
Triggered when the confirm button is clicked
Triggered when the cancel button is clicked
Triggered when the pop-up window is opened
Triggered when closing the pop-up window
Triggered after the pop-up window is opened and the animation ends
Triggered after the pop-up window is closed and the animation ends

The component provides the following CSS variables, which can be used to customize styles. For usage, please refer to

html .default .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html .dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}html.dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}
